subject: TONIGHT ON SHOWBIZ TONIGHT- CNN HEADLINE PRIME 11pm ET/ 11pm PT
body:
CNN.com - Showbiz Tonight










TONIGHT ON SHOWBIZ TONIGHT- CNN HEADLINE PRIME 11pm ET/ 11pm PT

PARIS HILTON'S MELTDOWN
Is Paris falling
apart behind bars? There are reports that she's crying on the
phone, not eating, not sleeping... and just generally not
having a good time. It is jail, after all! Will Paris be able
to hang in there? The inside story of what's going on behind
closed bars, tonight on Showbiz Tonight!

ARE
HOLLYWOOD'S BAD GIRLS A GOOD EXAMPLE?
Are the bad girls of Hollywood actually a good influence on
young girls everywhere? Could the behavior of the likes of
Paris Hilton and Lindsay Lohan actually be a good thing? The
controversial theory, tonight on TV's most provocative
entertainment news show. 

THE MOST EMBARRASSING
CELEBRITY INTERVIEWS!
From Britney Spears chomping gum
to Tom Cruise going off on Matt Lauer to Paula Abdul acting
bizarre on morning TV, Showbiz Tonight counts down the top five
most embarrassing celebrity interviews ever! 

SHOWBIZ TONIGHT QUESTION OF THE DAY:
Young
Hollywood's meltdown: Are the parents to blame?
VOTE AT
CNN.COM/SHOWBIZ TONIGHT. 

SEND US A VIDEO
EMAIL!
Send your response to the Question Of The Day
on video. Look into your camera and tell us what you think.
Responses must be no longer than 30 seconds. To send your video
email, go to cnn.com/showbiztonight.Watch your video responses
on "Showbiz Tonight" at 11 p.m. ET/PT on CNN Headline Prime.
